name: Commandment
description:
"... in Alyosha's crypt, there's just like, a big hole that goes straight down. And at first, they just think it's like a big dark spot... but it's just like a bore-hole. It's just a hole that goes straight down... It's got grooves along the side that are very, very even.... And it just goes straight down, into the tree."

-Janine Hawkins, Spring in Hieron ep 42 || Friends at the Table

A small fangame made for aetherkids as part of the Friends at the Table 2019-2020 "Secret Samol" gift exchange.  https://twitter.com/secretsamol

Contains spoilers for elements of the "Seasons of Hieron" story series, particularly about the state of the world once the story is done!

Uses mouse input exclusively. Can be completed in about 5 minutes.

In no way associated or endorsed by Friends at the Table. However, it's a wonderful podcast about critical worldbuilding, smart characterization, and fun interaction between good friends, so I recommend you give it a listen! http://friendsatthetable.net/

Features an arrangement of music written by Jack de Quidt. Listen to all their music from the show at https://notquitereal.bandcamp.com/

Made by Brendan McLeod. Follow me on twitter @ _sulcata

Made using Unity and the ink dialogue tool.

Art made using Pyxel Edit. Music arranged in FL Studio, featuring the Sonic Forest library by Impact Soundworks. Fonts by Chevy Ray.
